definition: to play (as children do)/to amuse oneself
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)

sentences.english: I let her play in the clear,blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 我讓她在清澈，蔚藍的天空玩耍。

sentences.english: and the mother was very, very disturbed.
sentences.chinese: 拿着水槍玩耍，噴得到處都是水，讓媽媽非常生氣。

sentences.english: Their role extends far beyond rough-and-tumble play, experts say.
sentences.chinese: 他們的角色遠遠不侷限於亂七八糟的玩耍，專家說。

sentences.english: On the Monkey Mountain the monkeys frolicked and played happily, which attracted the eyes of many tourists.
sentences.chinese: 猴山上猴子們歡鬧玩耍，吸引不少遊客的目光。

sentences.english: The children were hopping to play on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在地上單腿跳來跳去的玩耍。

sentences.english: On Sunday, I could play with my dog BaiBai in here.
sentences.chinese: 在週六，我會和我的狗貝貝在這裏玩耍。

sentences.english: In colonial days in America, children rolled hoops along the streets, guiding them with sticks.
sentences.chinese: 在殖民時代的美國，孩子們沿街用木棍引導滾圈玩耍。

sentences.english: It's healthy for children to play in the fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在空氣新鮮的地方玩耍對他們的健康有益。

sentences.english: A little boy loved to come and lay around it everyday.
sentences.chinese: 有個小男孩每天都愛來到這裏，在旁邊玩耍。

sentences.english: Few children prefer working to playing.
sentences.chinese: 很少有孩子只愛工作不愛玩耍。

sentences.english: He never yelled at us for playing in his yard .
sentences.chinese: 我們在他的院子裏玩耍，他也從不對我們大喊大叫。

sentences.english: She took Josh to a newpark to play with new friends.
sentences.chinese: 她帶喬舒亞去新的公園和新朋友玩耍。

sentences.english: Home , home on the range , where the deer and the antelope play.
sentences.chinese: 家，草原上的家，那裏有鹿和羚羊在玩耍。

sentences.english: Two boys and a dog are playing under a tree.
sentences.chinese: 二個男孩和一隻狗正在樹下玩耍。

sentences.english: She plucks the withered leaf from the balsam, and looks at the grass-covered rampart, on which many children are playing.
sentences.chinese: 許多小孩子就在那上面玩耍。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to play/to have fun/to hang out
to only want to have a good time/to just want to have fun, and to shy away from self-discipline
to take a walk/to go for a walk
